title: Garrett Rejected by Members of the Group

content.question: Garrett is rejected by members of his friend group when they realize that he often takes advantage of them to enhance his own standing. He considers himself superior, and he overstates his abilities and his contributions to the group. Garrett is displaying behaviors most consistent with which of the following disorders?

topic.text: 5.4: Selection of Categories of Psychological Disorders

skill.text: 1.A: Apply psychological perspectives, theories, concepts, and research findings to a scenario.
